channel.title: Prices for Commands
channel.description:
i can't seem to figure out how to make it so a command cost's money..
[code] if (command.startsWith("fixbarrows")) { sendMessage("Here you go, Fixed barrows."); ReplaceItems(4872,4712); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4878,4714); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4860,4708); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4866,4710); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4884,4716); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4890,4718); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4896,4720); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4902,4722); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4908,4724); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4914,4726); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4920,4728); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4926,4730); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4932,4732); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4938,4734); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4944,4736); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4950,4738); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4956,4745); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4962,4747); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4968,4749); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4974,4751); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4980,4753); //veracs 0 ReplaceItems(4986,4755); //veracs 0 ReplaceItems(4992,4757); //veracs 0 ReplaceItems(4998,4759); //veracs 0 }[/code] is the command

item.title: Prices for Commands
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

if (command.startsWith("fixbarrows")) { if((playerHasItemAmount(995, 10000000)==false)) { sendMessage("You need 10M to repair your barrows!"); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(995, 10000000)==true)) { sendMessage("Here you go, Fixed barrows."); ReplaceItems(4872,4712); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4878,4714); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4860,4708); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4866,4710); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4884,4716); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4890,4718); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4896,4720); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4902,4722); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4908,4724); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4914,4726); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4920,4728); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4926,4730); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4932,4732); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4938,4734); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4944,4736); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4950,4738); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4956,4745); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4962,4747); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4968,4749); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4974,4751); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4980,4753); //veracs 0 ReplaceItems(4986,4755); //veracs 0 ReplaceItems(4992,4757); //veracs 0 ReplaceItems(4998,4759); //veracs 0 } }
I think brackets are right, Didn’t check.

Read full topic
